title: Tim Henson from Polyphia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, play a song at someone's house, converting them into Tim Henson from Polyphia. You turn into whatever their role was before conversion.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Players who were previously Tim Henson from Polyphia cannot be turned back into Tim Henson from Polyphia, and instead a random player will be converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Turn someone else into Tim Henson from Polyphia and steal their role and win with your new faction.

desc:
Post 4636
*You can NOT play like tim henson!!!! put that guitar down and get back to playing football!!!!*
